articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Service Personnel Who Took Part in KPA Drills
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Service Personnel Who Took Part in KPA Drills
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with service personnel who participated in the actual parachuting and striking drills of paratrooper units of the KPA.
					 The drills were staged from August 27 to 29.
					
					 He showed such loving care as having a photo taken with paratroopers of sub-units under 323 Unit, 162 Unit and 252 Unit and airpersons of 858 Unit of Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA who performed military feats in the above-said drills.
					
					 He came out to the photographing site and waved back to enthusiastic cheers of the participants.
					
					 He encouraged the service personnel who successfully carried out their difficult tasks in combat training which called for overcoming the biggest physical burdens under the worst conditions by making the training part of their life and habit as intended by the party.
					
					 He had a photo session with them, expressing his expectation and conviction that they would firmly prepare themselves as a-match-for-a-hundred fighters possessed of perfect fighting capabilities by undergoing intensive trainings under the simulated conditions of an actual war in the future, too.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, O Kum Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Pang Kwan Bok, Jang Tong Un and Pak Thae Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Kanji Inoki
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan who is also chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Kanji Inoki
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan who is also chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday by Kanji Inoki.

articles.title: Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Int'l Pro-Wrestling Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest in the idea of "For Peace, Friendship" opened at the Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium Saturday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Kanji Inoki, chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan, and Jang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, who are co-chairmen of the organizing committee of the contest, Pak Kun Gwang, chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Kim Myong Chol, executive member of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, people, youth and students in the city, couples of foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their wives, foreign guests and overseas compatriots.
					
					 The opening ceremony started with a peculiar art performance.
					
					 Pro-wrestlers to take part in the contest entered the gymnasium.
					
					 At the ceremony, Kanji Inoki made an address.
					
					  He said he was pleased to note that it was his 30th visit to the DPRK since he paid his first visit to the DPRK in 1994 thanks to his relationship with his teacher Rikidozan (Kim Sin Rak).
					
					 Exchanges between countries start and develop through exchanges of sports, culture and other fields, he said.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the door of the Japan-DPRK relations which had long remained closed would be open and the two countries would become "close and friendly neighbors," not "near and distant countries" with the current international contest as an occasion.
					
					 Then Jang Ung made a speech.
					
					 He warmly welcomed the pro-wrestlers of different countries of the world who came to Pyongyang to take part in the contest and other foreigners who came to watch it. 
					
					 Jang went on:
					
					 We will as ever make positive efforts to strengthen international cooperation and solidarity with countries in the sports exchange and other fields in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He expressed the belief that all pro-wrestlers taking part in the contest would give full play to their special techniques and skills and please the spectators and glorify the contest as an event to be specially recorded in the history of the world pro-wrestling contests.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Technical Updating of Posan Iron Works of Chollima Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Technical Updating of Posan Iron Works of Chollima Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the technical updating of the Posan Iron Works of the Chollima Steel Complex.
					 Going round work sites for the technical updating, he encouraged officials and workers in their efforts to make innovations in body assembling of revolving furnace No. 4 and the building of a new screen ground.
					
					 There took place a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 The meeting referred to the significance and importance of the modernization of the iron works in remarkably decreasing the power consumption, cutting down the steelmaking time and increasing iron and steel. It underlined the need for relevant units to produce in time necessary custom-built equipment and products.
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round the Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 He called for building well tree nurseries across the country, working out the plans for tree planting on a long-term basis and rising up as one in the drive to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery and orchard.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Abusing Olympic Idea for Their Sinister Political Purpose
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Abusing Olympic Idea for Their Sinister Political Purpose
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Olympic Committee Friday released a statement assailing the south Korean authorities for abusing sacred sports and cultural exchange for their sinister political purpose and confrontation with the fellow countrymen. 
					 As reported, the DPRK Olympic Committee re-clarified its decision not to send a cheerleading squad to the 17th Asian Games due to the south Korean authorities' wrong attitude. 
					
					 Much upset by strong public protest and denunciation at home and abroad, the south Korean puppet forces let a spokesman for the Ministry of Unification shamelessly express "regret", "twisted assertion" and the like, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK delegation had already notified formally those concerned of the Asian Games Organizing Committee and those concerned of the puppet authorities of this decision. However, they feigned ignorance of this and when the fact was brought to light, they are working hard to mislead public opinion by creating impression that the notice of the DPRK was an unofficial one, talking about "verbal mention." 
					
					 As already known, the DPRK formally announced its decision to send to the 17th Asian Games slated to take place in Inchon, south Korea the players group and a large cheerleading squad of 350 persons and stepped up the preparations for it. 
					
					 As soon as the DPRK made public its decision to send the cheerleading squad, the south Korean puppet authorities and conservative forces let loose such sheer sophism as "it is a group for political operation in the south", "it is a group for political propaganda from the Workers' Party of Korea" and "it will create discord in the south" and slandered it with such unspeakable vitriol as "double-dealing tactics of reconciliation and war" and "strategy of using beauties." 
					
					 Thrown into consternation by the great sensation created in south Korea by the news of the dispatch of the DPRK's cheerleading squad, the puppet forces let their paid trumpeters run the whole gamut of invectives that south Korean public attention would focus on the cheerleading squad and then it would be like putting the cart before the horse. 
					
					 The puppet authorities' wrong attitude towards the DPRK's decision to send the cheerleading squad found a clearer manifestation at the north-south working-level talks held on July 17 for its participation in the 17th Asian Games. 
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to give up the decision to send the cheerleading squad as they desperately decried its decision, far from rejoicing over and welcoming its sincerity. 
					
					 The above-said facts go to clearly  prove that the south Korean puppet forces are abusing sacred sports and cultural exchange for their sinister political purpose and confrontation with the fellow countrymen  and are chiefly to blame for blocking national reconciliation and unity and the process to improve the north-south relations. 
					
					 With no subterfuge can the puppet forces justify their action taken for barring the cheerleading squad of the DPRK from taking part in the Inchon Asian Games.

articles.title: Sojourn in Pyongyang of Foreign Pro-wrestlers
articles.content:
Sojourn in Pyongyang of Foreign Pro-wrestlers
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest toured the sports village in Chongchun Street here on Friday.
					 Bob Sapp, a U.S. pro-wrestler, told KCNA, giving his impressions of the DPRK:
					
					 "This is the cleanest country that I have ever been.
					
					 Every one is smiling so bright. I definitely know that I consider myself ignorant to just thinking that north Korea was kind of a gloomy and very sad place. This is very beautiful and very exciting, big fun place.
					
					 I hope to be invited, so that I can come back again."
					
					 Meanwhile, pro-wrestlers from different countries enjoyed themselves in the village, playing tug of war and arm-wrestle with young citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 What drew attention of many Pyongyang citizens there in particular was a scene of pulling a 17.5-ton bus by Bob Sapp and Erik Hammer of the U.S. and Jerome Le Banner of France.
					
					 Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors and chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan who is co-chairman of the contest organizing committee, met with Ryu Il Hun, a 13-year-old judoist of the DPRK April 25 Sports Team. Ryu weighing 85 kg is a great-grandson by daughter of Kim Sin Rak (Rikidozan) known as the world pro-wrestling champion.

articles.title: DPRK: National Records Renewed in Various Sports Events
articles.content:
DPRK: National Records Renewed in Various Sports Events
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the DPRK set new national records in various sports events during the recent domestic tournaments.
					 The Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army renewed the previous records in the women's team 10-meter air rifle and the men's team 10-meter running target mixed of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize. And the April 25 Sports Team set a new record in the women's 50-meter breaststroke of the Sports Contest for Jonsung Cup.
					
					 At the Junior Championships, new national records were set in more than 10 events including men's team 10-meter air rifle and weightlifting.
					
					 A weightlifter of the Taeryonggang Sports Team renewed the record in men's 59kg jerk by lifting 11kg more. He made new records in snatch, jerk and totals, drawing attention of experts.
					
					 Also, new records were made in men's 45kg and 54kg and women's 35kg and 38kg weightlifting events.
					
					 The 51st National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools, too, witnessed new records in swimming.

articles.title: Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Leaves
articles.content:
Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy led by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate and chairman of the Italia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Mongolian VIPs Leave
articles.content:
Mongolian VIPs Leave
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- O. Mashbat, advisor to the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Mongolia, and his party left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Different Countries
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Different Countries
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the occasions of the second anniversary of the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on him and the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 He received congratulatory messages and letters from the general secretary of the Palestinian Popular Struggle Front, the chairman of the C.C., the Party of "Communists of Russia" and the president of the Socialist Party of Benin.
					
					 He also received messages and letters from the vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the director of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, and senior officials of political, public and economic circles of China, Russia, Thailand, Pakistan, Germany, Belarus, Switzerland, France, Finland, UK, Austria, Nigeria, Benin and Ecuador and delegates of Juche idea study organizations, organizations for supporting Korea's reunification and friendship organizations.
					
					 The messages and letters expressed belief that the Korean people would register successes in defending socialism and building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Strain of Apple Cultivated in DPRK
articles.content:
New Strain of Apple Cultivated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Pomology Institute under the Academy of Agriculture Science in the DPRK has grown new strain of early-ripening apple.
					 The new strain is superior in taste and size than the existing ones.
					
					 This apple tree comes into bloom from one year after its planting and bears fruit from two years after. It blooms early in May and its fruits get ripe in mid-August.
					
					 The tree, resistant to red aphid and other aphides, is small and its joints are short. Its fruit weighs 240 grams in average, 320g to the maximum.
					
					 The new strain can yield fruits three times those of the existing ones, 2-4 years after it is planted.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 8 Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 8 Published
 Pyongyang August 30 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 8 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. It is a library of the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea which comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order. 
					 It contains 120 works published by leader Kim Jong Il from April, Juche 53 (1964) to June, Juche 54 (1965).
					
					 The period was a turning one when the DPRK was entering into a historic stage to comprehensively build socialism of Juche under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and, thereby, a new surge was being effected in the struggle of the party and the revolution.
					
					 In the work "Let Us Develop Our Party into the Eternal Party of Comrade Kim Il Sung", he said that to strengthen the party into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung is his lifelong task and clarified the idea on accomplishing this glorious task.
					
					 In other works, he called upon all officials to follow the President's work method to turn the party work into the work with people and take care of their destiny in a responsible manner as their mothers would do.
					
					  In various works he clarified the original idea that the Korean People's Army should always perform the vanguard role in the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche. He also indicated the validity of the revolutionary line of the WPK on simultaneously carrying out the economic construction and the building of national defense and the principled issues of bolstering up the defence capability including the issue of thoroughly preparing service personnel of the Korean People's Army politically and ideologically and carrying out the military line for self-defence.
					
					 Expounded in the book are works which clarify the concrete tasks and ways facing various fields of the national economy and the ways of improving the work of literature and arts and the press.
					
					 Also carried in the book are works dealing with the issue of enhancing the function and role of working people's organizations including the youth league and improving the civil aviation as required by the developing reality and the issue of positively promoting swimming in conformity with the specific conditions of Korea, the maritime country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats 
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Songun revolutionary feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il are the eternal treasure which helps the DPRK shed its rays forever as the powerful Paektusan nation, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 His Songun revolutionary feats have helped remarkably augment the political and ideological power of the country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 He steadily developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun revolutionary idea which gives perfect answers to all the theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The indomitable mental power of the army and people of the DPRK is being given full play thanks to a high-pitched revolutionary ideological offensive, thus bringing about steady miracles and innovations in all work sites for a great surge. This is a striking demonstration of the political and ideological advantages and might of the country.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun leadership provided by him with superhuman will while leading the struggle for defending socialism, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK grew stronger to be an elite army reliably protecting the country, the revolution and socialism from all challenges and aggression moves of the enemies.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun leadership given by him while powerfully encouraging the service personnel of the Korean People's Army, monumental structures in the era sprang up in different parts of the country and the immutable truth that Korea does what it is determined to do has been clearly proved.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now fully demonstrating the dignity and might of the powerful Paektusan nation before the whole world, faithfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Jong Il and eternally glorifying them under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Declare General Strike in Protest against Misrule
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Declare General Strike in Protest against Misrule
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KNCA) -- Trade union organizations of the public sector of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on August 27 at which they declared that they would stage a general strike in demand of the withdrawal of the unpopular labor policy.
					 Speeches were made at the meeting. 
					
					 The speakers said that the measure for bringing the public sector to normal pursued by the present regime was premised on the sacrifice of workers in the field of public sector.
					
					 They noted they would stage a general strike to oppose the authorities' de-nationalization of the public sector and win the workers' right.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Suppression of Opposition Party Member
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Suppression of Opposition Party Member
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a statement on August 28 denouncing the puppet authorities for cracking down on the protest as regards the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The statement recalled that on the same day the police searched the house of the director for education of the opposition Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 The police committed such action when the director was going to come out to a venue of the strike as chief of the strike group for probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, it charged.
					
					 Suppression is not workable, it said, warning that if the authorities try to gloss over the issue of the ferry Sewol disaster through the suppression of progressive forces, they will face bigger resistance of the people.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Different Countries 
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo exhibition and film show took place at the External Relations Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, a photo exhibition at Mongolia-DPRK Friendship Joint Venture Hospital and a film show at a police station in Yobe State, Nigeria on Aug. 22. 
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the Songun leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean films dealing with the undying Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The head of the External Relations Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba said that August 25, 1960 was the very significant day for the Korean people. 
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il the Songun revolutionary line became the strategic line of the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 It is a very important issue for Cuba to apply the Songun politics.
					
					 The director of the above-said hospital said the photo exhibition offered him an opportunity to keenly realize once again the greatness of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and know well about the history of their love and dedication for the people. 
					
					 The chief of the police station in Yobe State, Nigeria said Kim Jong Il put the military capability of the DPRK on the highest stage with his Songun revolutionary leadership, direct primary efforts to strengthening the politico-ideological power of the army and turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power with his Songun leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania posted the detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's famous work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on its website "Juche Idea" on August 24.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con infantes paracaidistas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con infantes paracaidistas de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio con los militares participantes en los ejercicios de caida y golpe de blancos de las subunidades de los infantes paracaidistas del EPC.
					El Mariscal tiro foto con los infantes paracaidistas de las subunidades subordinadas a las Unidades 323, 162 y 252 del EPC y los pilotos de la Unidad 858 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, quienes realizaron meritos militares en el entrenamiento.
					
					Salio al lugar de filmacion respondiendo a las efusivas aclamaciones de los participantes y estimulo a ellos quienes cumplieron magnificamente la tarea de ejercicios combativos tan dificiles de superar la maxima carga fisica en una situacion tan peor acostumbrandolos y normalizandolos en acato a la voluntad del partido.
					
					Expreso una esperanza y conviccion de que todos los participantes se prepararan bien como combatientes con capacidad de batalla real, dispuestos a combatir uno contra cien enemigos a traves de los cotidianos ejercicios intensos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, O Kum Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Pang Kwan Bok, Jang Tong Un y Pak Thae Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Kanji Inoki y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Kanji Inoki y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 30 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el senador japones Kanji Inoki, director jefe de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz de Japon y copresidente del comite organizador de la Competencia internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang, y su comitiva, que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de Kanji Inoki
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el senador Kanji Inoki, director jefe de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz de Japon y copresidente del comite organizador de la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 30 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua renovacion tecnica de Fundicion de Hierro de Posan
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua renovacion tecnica de Fundicion de Hierro de Posan
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno el estado de renovacion tecnica de la Fundicion de Hierro de Posan del Complejo de Acero Chollima.
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fundicion, el premier estimulo a los funcionarios y obreros de la empresa quienes registran auge sucesivo en el montaje del cuerpo de horno giratorio no. 4 y en la construccion de nuevo campo de seleccion.
					
					En el terreno fue convocada la reunion de consulta de los funcionarios de la rama interesada.
					
					En la ocasion se destaco el significado y la importancia de la modernizacion de la empresa orientada a reducir notablemente el gasto de electricidad y el tiempo de fundicion de hierro y a incrementar la produccion de materiales de hierro y urgio a las unidades vinculadas a producir y enviar a tiempo los equipos encargados y productos de colaboracion.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier visito la Almaciga Central adscrito al Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental.
					
					En la ocasion subrayo la necesidad de acondicionar bien las almacigas de todo el pais, elaborar con amplia vision el plan de reforestacion de todo el pais y  movilizar como un solo hombre a todas las personas en la labor por crear el area forestal y frutero.

articles.title: Comite Olimpico de RPDC rechaza abuso de intercambio deportivo y cultural
articles.content:
Comite Olimpico de RPDC rechaza abuso de intercambio deportivo y cultural
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion denunciando a la camarilla titere del Sur de Corea que malemplea el intercambio deportivo y cultural en los malsanos designios politicos y el enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					El Comite Olimpico de la RPDC ya aclaro de nuevo la decision de no enviar el grupo de hinchas a los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, debido al injusto  proceder de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Al ver que tanto en el interior como en el exterior se alzan las voces de denuncia y protesta por el respecto, los titeres surcoreanos actuan sin escrupulos presentando al vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion que dice "lastima", "insistencia tergiversada" y otras sofisterias. 
					
					Ya avisamos oficialmente al comite organizador y a las autoridades surcoreanas no enviar el grupo de hinchas. Sin embargo, la camarilla titere no hablo nada de ello. Y cuando se ha revelado la verdad, intenta inducir en error la opinion publica como si no fuera oficial el "aviso oral" de la RPDC. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, publicamos  oficialmente que enviariamos a los jugadores y el grupo de hinchas compuesto por 350 personas a los XVII Juegos Asiaticos que se efectuaran en Inchon del Sur de Corea y hemos venido acelerando sus preparativos. 
					
					Pero, tan pronto como se publicara ese aviso, las autoridades y fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas lo calumniaron como "tactica de dos caras: amistad y guerra" y "seduccion por mujeres bellas", calificando el grupo de hinchas de "grupo de trabajo politico en el Sur de Corea" y "grupo de propaganda politica enviado por el Partido del Trabajo" y hablando de la "creacion de discordia entre personas surcoreanas". 
					
					Y muy aturdidas ante las grandes repercusiones producidas en suelo surcoreano por la noticia sobre el envio de nuestro grupo de hinchas, instigaron a los trompeteros venales a soltar las maldiciones de toda indole tales como "el grupo de hinchas de la parte Norte atraera la atencion y se alterara el anfitrion y el convidado". 
					
					La malsana actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas en cuanto al envio de nuestro grupo de hinchas se puso al desnudo en las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur efectuadas el 17 de julio pasado para discutir la participacion de nuestra parte en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos. 
					
					Dado que los titeres surcoreanos insultan tanto la sinceridad de la parte connacional, lejos de aplaudirla y aceptarla, nos vemos obligados a suspender el envio del grupo de hinchas. 
					
					Esta vez, se ha revelado claramente que los titeres surcoreanos malemplean el intercambio deportivo y cultural en sus designios politicos malintencionados y el enfrentamiento fratricida e impiden la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no pueden justificar con nada su culpa por haber impedido la participacion del grupo de hinchas de la parte Norte de Corea en los Juegos Asiaticos de Inchon.
